title: Enhancing Teaching Methodology Competencies: Math-Based Problem-Solving for Strengthening Plant Science Research Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biology and secondary-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can statistically analyze plant genetics data to explain correlations between genetic variations and phenotypes.
Learners can interpret experimental data and predict optimal growth conditions using biochemical reaction rate equations.
Learners can simulate growth patterns in response to environmental changes by constructing mathematical models based on plant physiology data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
